about_the_game: Prepare your ears for a full frontal aural assault with the POSTAL 4: No Regerts Soundtrack! Subject your auditory senses to over 50 tracks that comprise the total Edensin experience spanning across a multitude of genres, from the pulse-pounding main menu theme to the ubiquitous mariachi music below the border to the laid back synthwave beats of Kunny Island and over to the suspiciously familiar and nostalgic mall muzak! Plus, treat your ears to the not-so-hidden bonus tracks to pique your intrigue!

content_descriptors.notes: tracks use various references to sexual and drug use.

detailed_description: Prepare your ears for a full frontal aural assault with the POSTAL 4: No Regerts Soundtrack! Subject your auditory senses to over 50 tracks that comprise the total Edensin experience spanning across a multitude of genres, from the pulse-pounding main menu theme to the ubiquitous mariachi music below the border to the laid back synthwave beats of Kunny Island and over to the suspiciously familiar and nostalgic mall muzak! Plus, treat your ears to the not-so-hidden bonus tracks to pique your intrigue!

short_description: Prepare your ears for a full frontal aural assault with the POSTAL 4: No Regerts Soundtrack! Over 50 tracks comprising the total Edensin experience spanning across a multitude of genres to give your auditory senses an unhealthy dose of POSTAL beats!
